title: ni dhasanudhasuDa
sahitya: nI dAsAnudAsuDa nani pErE Emi phalamuanupallavi pEda sAdhulandu nIku prEmalEka pOyEcaraNam 1 sarivArilO nannu cauka jEsitivi gAni karuNimpa lEka nIdu karmamanedavu gAni   caraNam 2 rOsamu lEshamu lEdayE rucira vAkkalu pOyE dAsula brOcitivaTa tyAgarAju ilalO
